page.title: 03A TYPICAL DAY (BOY) FORRES E
page.content: My day begins when I get up at 7:40am and get dressed to go to school.I then have my breakfast of cereal and milk,toasted bread and tea.After this I make my way to school,on foot.School begins at 8:45 each weekday.a normal day will include Geography,History ,English and Maths.Other subjects often taught are Science,Physical Education,Music and Art.At 1:00pm. school breakes up for lunch. A normal lunch for me would be cooked beef, potatoes,and a dessert.After school I will go home and have my supper at 5:15pm.After supper I often go out with my friends and go to the local swimming pool.Sometimes we play,or go to watch football.My day ends at 10pm when I go to bed.
